ygData.subject: Re: More info on working with Darkwood
ygData.msgSnippet: expounding from person experience...reach 200 skill in fletching... decide to try darkwoods to celebrate...put darkwood staff, silk, plane, 2 cams in
ygData.messageBody:
expounding from person experience...reach 200 skill in fletching...
decide to try darkwoods to celebrate...put darkwood staff, silk, plane, 2
cams in kit...combine...fail...put darkwood staff, silk, plane, 2 cams in
kit...combine...fail...go hunting clockworks in steamfont cause i'm now
broke and trueshots are my only hope of regaining money with any speed :(

moral of the story...buy wisdom gear before you combine expensive stuff...

Xillitil/Povar

>
>Could you expound on this a little? I have discovered that all Oak bows
>are
>trivial to me (although I haven't made the 2 cam variety yet). Is a skill
>of 170 sufficient to start making Darkwood bows? At what point do
>darkwoods
>become trivial if at ever? What's the failure rate at 170 vs close to 200.
>
